room_title: Escape room "Tomb Explorer" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We had a blast! The Tomb Explorer was well designed and thoroughly thought out. Challenging and intriguing but we made it out and had so much fun doing it!

room_title: Escape room "Tomb Explorer" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We did Tomb Explorer for my daughter's 13th birthday and we had a blast!!

room_title: Escape room "Tomb Explorer" by Escape Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We just did the Tomb Escape and it was amazing! Great set up and well planned out. It was so much fun for all of us. We can't wait to try Carnegie's escape next! Thanks to all the guys there they were super friendly and fun too!
